title: STEAM-Integrated E-Textile Computing Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuits and simple programming
context.additional_context: Arts-technology integrated education linked to language curricula, aiming to strengthen foundational wearable computing competencies in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply fundamental electrical circuit design principles in the process of creating e-textiles.
Learners can create innovative works utilizing Arduino-based sensor control technology for wearable projects.
Learners can design integrated educational scenarios linking computational thinking to language curriculum topics (e.g., literary analysis).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
